# Iquitos Tech - llms.txt

## Site Information
- **Name**: Iquitos Tech
- **URL**: https://iquitostech.com
- **Domain**: iquitostech.com
- **Language**: Spanish (es-ES)
- **Region**: Peru, Latin America
- **Launch Date**: 2025
- **Last Updated**: August 14, 2025

## Site Description
Iquitos Tech is a technology and gaming news website focused on providing the latest updates in technology, video games, artificial intelligence, programming, and digital trends. The site serves Spanish-speaking audiences, particularly in Peru and Latin America, with comprehensive coverage of the tech industry.

## Content Categories
- **Technology News**: Latest developments in tech industry
- **Gaming**: Video game news, reviews, and industry updates
- **Movies**: Movies news, reviews
- **Programming**: Development tutorials and industry insights
- **Digital Trends**: Emerging technologies and digital culture
- **Hardware Reviews**: Tech product reviews and comparisons
- **Mobile Technology**: Smartphone and mobile app coverage

## Technical Stack
- **Framework**: Astro v5.11.2 (Static Site Generator)
- **Language**: TypeScript, JavaScript
- **Content Management**: WordPress CMS (headless)
- **Deployment**: Vercel
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics with consent mode
- **Monetization**: Google AdSense (ca-pub-7561415153058679)
- **Database**: Supabase (for view counts and analytics)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS

## Key Features
- **SEO Optimized**: Yoast SEO integration with automatic meta tag generation
- **Performance Focused**: Static site generation for fast loading
- **Mobile Responsive**: Optimized for all device sizes
- **Cookie Compliance**: GDPR-compliant cookie consent system
- **Social Media Integration**: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, WhatsApp
- **Real-time Analytics**: Post view tracking and trending content
- **Schema Markup**: Structured data for better search visibility

## Content Structure
- **Homepage**: Latest news and trending posts
- **Posts**: Individual articles with full content
- **Categories**: Organized by topic (Technology, Gaming, etc.)
- **Author Pages**: Content by specific authors
- **About Page**: Site information and mission
- **Contact**: Communication channels
- **Privacy Policy**: Data protection and privacy information
- **Terms of Service**: Usage terms and conditions

## Authors and Team
- **Primary Author**: Gael Montes
- **Editorial Team**: Technology journalists and gaming experts
- **Content Focus**: Spanish-language tech journalism
- **Editorial Standards**: Accurate, timely, and relevant technology coverage

## Social Media Presence
- **Twitter**: @IquitosTech
- **Facebook**: Verified business page
- **YouTube**: Video content and tech reviews
- **TikTok**: Short-form tech content

## Verification and Authority
- **Google AdSense**: Verified publisher (ca-pub-7561415153058679)
- **Facebook**: Domain verified (6quprs4p5kl4znnw4enaohuvdntjgv)
- **Pinterest**: Domain verified (5e3af78a2f00212446ef99663a96f07c)
- **Search Console**: Google verified
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics 4 integrated
- **Sitemap**: Available at /sitemap.xml

## Target Audience
- **Primary**: Spanish-speaking tech enthusiasts
- **Geographic**: Peru, Latin America, global Spanish speakers
- **Demographics**: Tech professionals, gamers, students, IT professionals, movie lovers
- **Interests**: Technology trends, gaming, programming, AI, digital innovationgit

## Content Guidelines
- **Language**: Spanish (Peruvian variant)
- **Tone**: Professional yet accessible
- **Update Frequency**: Daily news updates
- **Content Types**: News articles, reviews, tutorials, analysis
- **Word Count**: Typically 800-1500 words per article

## Technical SEO
- **Canonical URLs**: Properly implemented
- **Meta Tags**: Dynamic generation from Yoast SEO
- **Open Graph**: Complete social media optimization
- **Twitter Cards**: Large image cards for social sharing
- **Schema.org**: Article and organization markup
- **Robots.txt**: Optimized for search engine crawling

## Performance Metrics
- **Page Speed**: Optimized for Core Web Vitals
- **Mobile Score**: 90+ on PageSpeed Insights
- **SEO Score**: Fully optimized with Yoast SEO
- **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant
- **Security**: HTTPS with modern security headers

## Contact Information
- **Website**: https://iquitostech.com
- **Contact Page**: https://iquitostech.com/contact
- **Editorial Inquiries**: Through contact form
- **Business Inquiries**: Available via website

- **Copyright**: Â© 2025 Iquitos Tech

- **Privacy Policy**: GDPR and local privacy law compliant
- **Terms of Service**: Standard website usage terms
- **Cookie Policy**: Comprehensive cookie management system

## Site Architecture
```
/                    # Homepage with latest news
/posts/[slug]        # Individual blog posts
/categoria/[slug]    # Category pages
/about              # About page
/contact            # Contact information
/privacy            # Privacy policy
/terms              # Terms of service
/corrections        # Editorial corrections
/newsletter         # Newsletter subscription
/sitemap.xml        # XML sitemap
/robots.txt         # Robots file
```

## Last Updated
This llms.txt file was last updated on August 14, 2025. For the most current information about Iquitos Tech, please visit https://iquitostech.com.

This file follows the llms.txt standard for providing AI systems with accurate, structured information about websites.
